a.title: Proposition K.I.D.S. for Galena R-II Schools

strong.span: Proposition K.I.D.S. on April 7th - NO TAX INCREASE BOND ISSUE! For more information on the proposition click here

span.style: background-color: rgb(238, 238, 238); font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);

span.span: nestled in the heart of Stone County. Approximately 500 students attend 2 schools: Galena-Abesville Elementary and Galena High School. Both schools offer a wide array of educational opportunities. Thank you for visiting our website.

p.span:
Galena R-II Schools are preparing our students to Stand Confidently, Participate Fully, Learn Continually and Contribute Globally.
